title: Deepika Padukone believes there is a `mastani` in every woman
text:
Bollywood leggy lass Deepika Padukone, who is all set to mesmerise the audience with her warrior princess role in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Baajirao Mastani', said that she believes there is a `mastani` in every woman.
The 'Happy New Year' star launched the very first song of the movie titled 'Dewaani Mastani' on Day One of the Blenders Pride Fashion Tour in the national capital.
When asked about her portrayal of her role of Mastani in the song , the 29-year-old actress said that every woman is a warrior, a nurturer, a mother, a friend and it is amazing for her as an actor to have all of these qualities in one woman and to be able to portray that on screen.
The 29-year-old actress added that the perfect word to describe the song would be 'nasha' as the song is kind of "nasheela" which can be entirely dedicated to one's lover.
The movie starring Ranveer Singh, Deepika and Priyanka Chopra in lead roles, is all set to hit the theatres on December, 18 2015.
